reviewText: Again I'm surprized no-one has yet to review this amazing classic.  This particular flick set trends, for what we all now enjoy, in old school kung fu! This movie "One Man Army", has a tremendous amount of old school kung fu,,and is entertaining from the start to finish.  I would be doing a gross dis-service to give details about this gem,,,you have to check it out!!! Rest assured you will not be dissapointed!!
